room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Great Room Escape in Columbus
review: I had 6 people do the Wild West room and it was a lot of fun. The deputy was great and stayed in character the whole time. My group of outlaws busted our way out of jail. I will definitely be back the next time I am in Columbus.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Great Room Escape in Columbus
review: Great time - good theme, challenging adventure, great staff. Eliza was our sheriff and got into character and added to the fun of the adventure.Would recommend it highly.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Great Room Escape in Columbus
review: We loved it!! This was only our second escape room. Mary did an excellent job as our drunk deputy. Excellent and funny staff too! Everything worked and kept us on our toes the whole time. Very exciting! I definitely will be going back to try the other rooms when I'm in the Columbus area again..Thanks for a great time!
